concept.title: File paths
concept.shortdesc: You might need to access certain files to locate specific information. For example, the log and trace files are required to keep a record of any issues when the Bridge is running.

conbody.p: The log file contains external information and records errors, warnings, and notices.
The trace file contains internal information that might be needed to debug any problems that are found.
